title: Goulash soup
ingredients: ['2 tsp rapeseed oil', '2 large onions, sliced', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '500g (1 lb 2 oz) lean chuck steak, trimmed and cut into 2 cm (3/4 in) cubes', '2 large carrots, diced', '1 tbsp paprika', '¼ tsp caraway seeds', '1 tin chopped tomatoes, about 400 g', '750ml (1¼ pints) beef stock, preferably home-made', '170g (6 oz) white cabbage, finely shredded', 'salt and pepper', 'chopped parsley to garnish', 'Parsley and onion dumplings', '2 tsp rapeseed or vegetable oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 egg', '3 tbsp skimmed milk', '3 tbsp chopped parsley', '120g (4¼ oz) fresh white breadcrumbs']
